segments.text: This kitchen is a mess with water flooding from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in the puddle, soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not smell or feel that wet disaster?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting water damage, it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this filth for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is in the wet area; he'll slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into that jar with dirty hands—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, probably stepping in water too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor is slippery and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't make up for this indoor slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness with hygiene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that faucet before it's a swamp in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The bunched-up towel on the plate looks damp already—revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes my skin crawl.
segments.speaker: PAR
